page.title: 17SOCIAL LIFE IN CHURCHDOWN
page.content: Churchdown Community Centre is situated just off Parton Road in the centre of Churchdown.It is the focal point of many activities in Churchdown.The Community Centre is used for wedding receptions,barn dances,discos,parties,rehersals for the Churchdown Male Voice Choir, meetings of the Brownies and concerts for elderly people.They also organise jumble sales and fetes to raise money for the benefit of Churchdown. There is also a pub called the Bat'n'Ball,where there is a warm and happy atmosphere and in Albemarle Road is the Chosen Hotel.Opposite the Bat'n'Ball in Churchdown is The Churchdown Club.
